org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.validation.validators

Class ValidHostValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.validation.validators.ValidHostValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstraintValidator<ValidHost>

    public class ValidHostValidator
extends Object
implements ConstraintValidator<ValidHost>
    Validator that checks an object to verify it is a valid hostname or IP address. Validation rules follow the same logic as in InetAddress.getByName(String).
    Since:
    2.8
